
The equivalence halo2 code is located [here](https://github.com/avras/mimc-halo2)

```plonkscript
# k: 7
# in1: 0

fn pow_5(x) {
    let x2 = x * x;
    let x4 = x2 * x2;
    x4 * x
}

gate hash_round(a, f, s) {
    s <| pow_5(a + f) - a[1];
}

public selector s_mimc_hash;

public input in1;
public output out;

private advice a;

public fixed f;

region permute_state(in1, a, f, s) {
    let rc = global::round_constants;
    let r = rc.len();
    a[0] <== in1;

    for i in 0..r {
        f[i] <-- rc[i];
        a[i + 1] <== pow_5(a[i] + rc[i]);
        s[i] <-- enable;
    }

    a[r]
}

let output = permute_state(in1, a, f, s_mimc_hash);

out <== output;

hash_round(a, f, s_mimc_hash);
```
